website_summaries.verdict: Majority of its users feel confident about the Asics Gel Sonoma 4, as they complimented the shoe’s features that have improved their running performance. Runners were quick to applaud the supportive and comfortable structure of the Gel Sonoma 4, while others expressed their delight over the shoe’s design and price. Although there were a few criticisms about fit, the overall rating of the Gel Sonoma 4 is positive.
pros: Many users appreciate the affordable price of the Asics Gel Sonoma 4
Some runners were pleased that the shoe does not require a break-in period
The Sonoma 4 is easy to clean, according to a reviewer
One user said the shoe provides a lot of support
The color options of the Gel Sonoma 4 are praised by many
The shoe feels durable, said a couple of buyers
cons: A couple of reviewers have mentioned that the shoe is too tight, especially for wide-footed wearers
One runner disliked the height of the collar and said it makes running uncomfortable

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: I would not purchase these again. They are only 2 months old and are already coming apart. Note in the two attached pictures the holes on each side. I would love to return them if at all possible.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory A Logan

customer_reviews.title: Good inexpensive shoe
customer_reviews.text: Ecoconomical shoe for me as a older person looking for low heel to toe difference. More natural. Thinner sole provided stable jog. Less expensive construction with printed pattern for support on sides may not offer support over time. Well cushioned sole without mushy feel of too soft elastomers. Reccommended for non hard core runner.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way too narrow for marked size
customer_reviews.text: I have D width feet and needed a shoe for a trail race. I saw these online and decided to try them. Bad choice, I tried them on once and packaged them up for return. They are so, so narrow. The length is sufficient for marked size (just barely) but the shoe is soooooo tight across the top I can't tie the laces. Time to try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: ZenguyTop Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: Great rubbing shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love them Are use them for running and CrossFit Great for cardio activities Really structured and firm - You can feel they are stabilizing your feet while you’re running but if you buy them don’t expect a very soft shoe The design is a bit rough but totally worth the money
customer_reviews.author: rubi

customer_reviews.title: Holding up fine
customer_reviews.text: I’m on my feet 10hrs a day at my job. It’s not very strenuous on the shoes but I’m standing and walking all day and I’ve had these for over a month. I do not have holes in my shoes and they don’t seem like they will get holes either.
customer_reviews.author: Oil boy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, just a bit tight but very secure
customer_reviews.text: very supportive and comfortable show, after 3-4 use break-in (10 miles). What's with the really cheap shoelaces? They must have saved 3 cents vs the previous model.
customer_reviews.author: Constant

customer_reviews.title: Running shoe runs about a half size smaller than standard shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the weight & color of this running shoe. Note: the laces that come with the shoe have orange trim & not blue as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Jim  M

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe, very light. Toe area is a little cramped, but that's getting better as I break them in.
customer_reviews.author: M.Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Hard to break in but really comfortable once they do.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben V

customer_reviews.title: It's great for the price point.
customer_reviews.text: The clean design was what initially attracted me, but the fit is very light and tight. I have very flat feet, too, so I instantly swapped the insoles for some with greater support. After about a week of outdoor use, they felt broken in. After another two weeks, the softer fabric on the side of the toe-box had snagged and ripped, and has gradually grown with time.
customer_reviews.author: AmericanCorgi

customer_reviews.title: great running shoe
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a hard foot to fit when it comes to shoes. He really liked how they fit. A great fitting quality shoes I believe is what he said
customer_reviews.author: Tanya M. Seymour-Keefe

customer_reviews.title: Good QPR and works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe with good cushioning. Stability is a bit less than expected but works well for moderate hikes/trail walks. I’m just over 200 lbs. if that helps some decide.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Barker

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe.
customer_reviews.text: These are just a tiny bit narrow compared to my usual Asics. Great looking shoe and they go really nice with brown or tan shorts.
customer_reviews.author: daleolson

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend and he loved them. Fit was true to size and extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Carey Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is 1/2 size too small. I recently purchased 2 asic shoes that were true to size. This one is not true.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Davis

customer_reviews.title: Little snug
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes. The width is a little snug but works out just fine for me. If you have wider feet you may have an issue with sizing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I will buy them again
customer_reviews.text: So far they are great shoes. I probably should have gotten a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: My husband won't stop taking about how much he likes these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is very light with little arch support. It has great heel support and fits comfortably. This is a wonderful shoe for walking or work. If you need a higher arch or you are looking for a running shoe, this is not the shoe for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality and comfortable shoe at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: Quality shoe at its best. Extremely comfortable in shuch way that a can wear them all day. They are also lightweight
customer_reviews.author: Julio

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Tried on at a store first and then purchased on Amazon. Comfy and work well!
customer_reviews.author: TheMrTRoe

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fell apart too soon. Only wore for 3 months before the tab and sole separated from the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Houston Cole

customer_reviews.title: Trying them out
customer_reviews.text: Heel is wider than my other ASICS, I have a narrow heel. So it feels like it slip. It hasn’t just hope I don’t get blisters
customer_reviews.author: jay mccormack

customer_reviews.title: Exact fit, good sneakers overall
customer_reviews.text: Size is just right but for width is a bit tight
customer_reviews.author: H A Salih

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and first time I didn't have to pull out the insole and replace it with an after market insole.
customer_reviews.author: Scott wright

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing because it’s a comfortable, good-looking shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Stitching on outside failed after just a couple hours of normal wear. I’m not heavy set nor do I have a wide foot. It’s either a fluke, poor quality or just a bad design.
customer_reviews.author: ThisBrandonJames

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes felt comfortable right away.Still breaking them in
customer_reviews.author: John C harris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit perfect and they are very comfortable just as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for me. Very comfortable and feels like you are running on air
customer_reviews.author: Pitch

customer_reviews.title: It feels great
customer_reviews.text: The fit was really good and comfortable. I use it for power walking
customer_reviews.author: Raynor Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Runs a half size small but great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a really good shoe but they run a half size small compared to most
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Asics great as always
customer_reviews.text: Most durable shoes ever. I use them everyday and on every terrain.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: great service; ordering was easy
customer_reviews.text: Asics makes a great product; always good quality and fit.
customer_reviews.author: rbrown

product_meta.title: ASICS - Mens Gel-Sonoma 4 Shoes
product_meta.description: Durable midsole material that provides cushion for all day comfort. Optimized trail outsole with both uphill and downhill lug configuration for great traction. Visual currency of a more modern trail design with a less bulky yet fully functional silhouette.
feature_bullets: AmpliFoam Midsole - Engineered to maintain durability at softer densities, providing better flexibility, comfort, and platform adaptability ideal for natural running.
Rearfoot GEL technology cushioning system - Attenuates shock during impact phase and allows for a smooth transition to midstance.
Trail Specific Outsole - Reversed lugs provide uphill and downhill traction on all types of terrain.
Ortholite Sockliner - Moisture management (Ortholite is a registered trademark of ATP Manufacturing LLC).
